name: Holt
description:
Holt will be releasing on a chapter basis and each new chapter will evolve the story more!

Holt is a 2D action platformer with a rich story. Shoot, slash, and adventure through levels of enemies and meet new friends along the way. Find out what has happened in the past and find out what the future holds.

Features:

  • Colorful characters
  • Rich combat
  • Customization
  • In-depth lore

Explore the world after the war

Dig up the past
